title: Masters at Arms
description: This edition is out of print and has been replaced by this edition combining it with Nobody's Angel.Masters at Arms begins the journey of three men, each on a quest for honor, acceptance, and to ease his unspoken pain. Their paths cross at one of the darkest points in their lives. As they try to come to terms with the aftermath--forging an unbreakable bond--will they ever truly become masters of their own fates? Or would fate become masters of them?
author: Kallypso Masters
